This has CINAVIA if anyone plans on playing this on their PS3.
Legit and very watchable rip.  Thanks max!

This still can be watched on a PS3 Cinavia, it will stop audio about every 20 minutes. The only thing I found that works is to pause the movie, go into manually changing date and time on the PS3 and add 1 month to the date set and return to the movie until it happens again. Enjoy
Buy a laptop with a cable HDMI !
